title: Did the Democrats in New York block a bill to expand educational assistance to gold star families?
subtitle: New York Goff. Andrew Como, who is also democratic, has gone beyond the legislative power to unilaterally expand the gold star education programme.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Democrats voted in a committee of the New York Society to stop a bill extending the state educational assistance programme covering the Gold Star families to include children of service members who were killed or disabled while not in combat.
